website_summaries.verdict: Simple color coated trays are ideal for engaging the whole family.
pros: Set comes with 3 trays and 3 droppers, perfect for the whole family to use
Large gummies are detailed and easy to remove
Trays are sturdy and easy to clean
Quickly make large batches of gummy bears at once
cons: Included droppers are quite small, not ideal for adults

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the right size molds.
customer_reviews.text: Forth try. The other molds I received are actually "mini bears" or even "miniscule bears." This mold, if filled almost full (not completely topped off) will produce a size which is very close to the original gummi bears, once they've been properly dehydrated. Bears pop out pretty much effortlessly. I always give the very top and the feet and extra nudge. Adding a little Corn Syrup in place of a bit of the liquid helps prevent sticking, as does a bit of Citric Acid.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely perfect and I love the dropper, it made making my first time batch of gummies so easy! The molds are absolutely wonderful, the bears came out with ease and clean up was a breeze! I am so in love with these and extremely happy with my purchase. Going to have many fun days ahead making different flavors for my grandkids :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kampf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Work great! I made organic sour gummy bears with olive oil as a supplement for my son and it worked great. One tip, before filling, put mold on a tray or plate that will fit in your fridge. If you fill it, then try to move, its flexible and will spill. The gummy bears came out so easily and washed great. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: got these to make healthy gummies for my children so they could have a healthy alternative. My 2 yr. olds favorite saying was "get some gummies"! the first time my daughter made a double batch and forgot to add a double amount of gelatin so they were a little hard to get out. I recommend leaving in the refrigerator until ready to remove so they stay firm enough to remove without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Yoder

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive large size molds
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered these mold because of the bigger size. Sadly they shipped out the standard size. Not happy with this purchase. Maybe they will allow me to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these molds. The large size bears are perfect for adults. Gelatin releases easily from mold and easy to clean. The 3 droppers are nice and allow for easy fill of the molds but if you have a steady hand you can just pour from a measuring cup. Droppers must be cleaned before gelatin sets. I use a straw brush to clean, soaking in warm water will also loosen gelatin. I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Gym Rat

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and used out of box
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet but these were 100% used. They were still sticky and very dirty. Unexpectable. Very disgusting to open a product that is sticky and has hair and other crap stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyvegas

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small,. They just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: These were just the right size. They may be slightly, and I mean slightly, bigger than the average gummy bear. The silicone was easy to clean and use. A great mold for home made edibles and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Capito

customer_reviews.title: Cute but they don't work with Jello
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both, the large and small, bear trays. The bears DO NOT come out of the tray intact, with jello. I even tried adding extra gelatin! Maybe they work better with chocolate??? :(
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Just made bears with my 6 years old, so easy even for him, we made them very healthy way, like handmade puree from blueberries, raspberries and mango plus maple syrup, delicious!!!! Will do over and over again
customer_reviews.author: Oleks .B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my large size silicone gummy bear molds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my large size silicone gummy bear molds. I just started getting into making gummy bears using small silicone molds which took forever to make. I can't tell you how extremely happy I was to find Avery Road Homewares with their larger ones. They are exactly as pictured & were delivered even two days before expected. I even got e-mails from the owner Carly giving me some quick tips along with recipes and then a thank you email for my purchase. Definitely we doing business with them again. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and they were REALLY small but this size is great and my grand kids will love them
customer_reviews.text: I originally got the smaller gummy bears and they were REALLY small but this size is great and my grand kids will love them :) Nice kit!
customer_reviews.author: Boolean

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail with multiple attempts
customer_reviews.text: Gummies stuck to the mold every. single. time. Useless, and thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this mold a few times now and love the way to bears come out. It can be a small pain to clean cause the mold is large with small inserts but I love the way the bears come out
customer_reviews.author: CarmenR

customer_reviews.title: I like the silicone flexible molds and you get three
customer_reviews.text: They need to be even bigger for the home cook. I had trouble getting them out of the holes on first try. I like the silicone flexible molds and you get three.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Peterson

customer_reviews.title: NOT jumbo at all
customer_reviews.text: The product description makes it seem like these gummy bear molds are jumbo, they are not. VERY SMALL and disappointing. Not working for the purpose they were bought for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These gummies came out adorable! I read the reviews and made sure to put them on a baking sheet before I filled them and I greased them before use. Getting them out was easier then I thought they’d be but still lost a few feet. You just have to go slow. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LFW

customer_reviews.title: These are nice but rather difficult to get the gummys to come ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but rather difficult to get the gummys to come out of the mold. Possibly there's a trick to it but it's not worth the effort to fill each little hole with gummy fixing only to fight again to eat the gummy! I'm back to purchasing gummy bears at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these molds yet, but they are so cute and it'll be a fun thing to do with the kids. I think that they'll work great for making sugar free "candies".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love the gummy bear molds. Easy to use and clean. Bought them so we could make elderberry syrup gummies. Turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Scott

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I read bad review so I was ify but I loved it. The biggest tip is when removing push the feet first so that the gummy bear wont break. When cleaning make sure I get all the crud out before washing it
customer_reviews.author: Karvilla

customer_reviews.title: Molds are awesome, wouldn't recommend droppers though
customer_reviews.text: The mold itself works awesome, super easy to pop the gummies out after they've set. I would not recommend using the droppers included however as they don't seem to hold the liquid very well. Will probably just pour from a measuring cup next time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Just very putzy to make make but they work and occupies the kids like it was meant to do
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size for Herbal Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Overall great! All of the gummies come out easy with cute details
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Beartastic
customer_reviews.text: It takes practice, to get the Haribo style recipe close. These are well made and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Marx

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier to have this mold set
customer_reviews.text: Id say this is a perfect match for my use. Its real silicone since no white shows when popping the gummies out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as described.
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't want bigger gummy bears. This works good and is easy to clean up. The droppers are a bit cheesy, but that is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Myriad Minds, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great molds.. liquid capacity of the bears is one teaspoon.. and they pop out nicely as long as cold.. i use a cassorole dish with ice water to keep them cool while popping them out
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. So easy to make hundreds of gummy bears! It goes so quick! You do not have to grease these molds which can be time consuming and messy. Just use a toothpick after letting the jello mixture set in them in the refrigerator for about half an hour or even less
customer_reviews.author: K. Wales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size gummy bears!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for handling...not too big, not too small. It's so fun to make them with my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S. Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Love my gummy molds!
customer_reviews.text: I have smaller gummy molds but they are just too small and a pain in the butt to fill, pop out, and clean. I LOVE the larger ones and only use the larger ones now. Waaaaayyyy easier to fill, pop out and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily make your own treats
customer_reviews.text: A light spray of cooking oil before adding the gelatin make these a breeze to use and ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Pro working kit.
customer_reviews.text: Makes me look like a pro. But I use a turkey baster rather than the eyedroppers that come with the kit. The eyedroppers work fine. But the turkey baster holds a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel

customer_reviews.title: ... are bigger than your usual "gummy bears" but I like them bigger
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than your usual "gummy bears" but I like them bigger. I bought these to make sugar free gummies. They came out easily. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Fiercefoxie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size of gummies , love the 3 droppers for making multi flavors . Super fast delivering
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, item as described and a lot of fun! Bonus recipe too!
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality molds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality molds, bears pop out easily and have nice detail. Each bear is about the same size as commercially produced bears.
customer_reviews.author: products I've purchased

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING sticks.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. NOTHING sticks. Now if I could just find a good jello, gummy, sugar free recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't buy these to make gummies. I got them for wax and soap and they were the largest option I could find. They release very well and the droppers are a nice addition although I have yet to utilize them.
customer_reviews.author: PlantationGal

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for what I was using for! This little tray worked great! These are the same size of the gummy bears you’d buy in store. The dropper doesn’t hold a ton, but it starts to cool so I think it’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Kayysmarr

customer_reviews.title: Great big bears
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Makes great bears. They pop out with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the molds they are perfect. I wish the droppers where bigger. other than that they are perfect

customer_reviews.title: I like that they are large and easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!! Unfortuantely, no body in my family likes homemade dummies (lol). Will keep trying more recipes! I like that they are large and easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great molds
customer_reviews.text: These molds are high quality. Candy pops out fully in tact and the molds are super easy to clean. The candy size is larger than most molds and has nice detail.
customer_reviews.author: HMc

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I have not had a chance to used them but they look like very good quality. And I received my PDF recipe the next day. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: Using this mold to make vitamins. I love the size. It is very easy to pop out the gummies and to clean
customer_reviews.author: Terri Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using these molds for hard candies and they are holding up well. I've made about 8 batches per mold. The molds do seem to absorb the cinnamon scent so I'll probably by another set to use for cinnamon only.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, I had no problems with my first batch of gummy candy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly kissane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size molds.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these specific molds. I don't have any issues with them just needed to have more molds. I love them and the delivery time is very quick.
customer_reviews.author: robin Houde

customer_reviews.title: Super fun product!
customer_reviews.text: So glad the molds are BPA free.The droppers that come with the mold are a perfect tool to get the job done. And the larger size mold makes it easier to remove the final product. Great fun! Customer service was brilliant and the product arrived exactly as described. Special thanks to Carly at Avery Road for being so helpful.

customer_reviews.title: love the recipes that were included
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, love the recipes that were included. Everything washes up great in the dishwasher.

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Made gummy bears they were easy to release from the molds and simple to clean. Ordering more to give as a gift. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger size and they work well for gummies.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This is the recommended size for making gummies that you want to dry out for a couple of days (to make them chewier); they shrink quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome! Big one inch gummy bears! Easy to pop out the bears, and easy to clean!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice I use these To make wine gummies For my coworkers And family Everybody love them

customer_reviews.text: So fun to use, easy to wash and very fast shipping.

customer_reviews.text: Great product, but unfortunately too big for what I need them for.

customer_reviews.title: great gummy molds
customer_reviews.text: Best gummy molds I've used. Gummies pop right out of molds no issues

customer_reviews.title: Daughter and I enjoy making regularly
customer_reviews.text: As described. Daughter and I enjoy making regularly. Easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The molds are of excellent quality and pass the pinch test
customer_reviews.text: The molds are of excellent quality and pass the pinch test. The bears remove easily even if you don't add enough unflavored gelatin. I also like the larger size of the bears, it's just right for making "adult" gummy bear with vodka.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bassett

customer_reviews.title: so I ordered these and they are the perfect size and the molds come out very easily
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered smaller ones first and wow were they teeny tiny, so I ordered these and they are the perfect size and the molds come out very easily.

customer_reviews.text: These molds are perfect for making yogurt gummy bears. I really like the size. Workmanship is excellent. A good buy.

customer_reviews.title: I love these! So easy to use and perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So easy to use and perfect for the best gummy bears! They pop right out of the silicone mold. Can't wait to get more of these in different shapes.

customer_reviews.text: These molds are so easy to use and made to detail.

customer_reviews.text: These molds are great. Very durable and exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for sugar free gummie bears. Its slightly bigger than the store bought gummies but I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, molds come out very easy
customer_reviews.text: Luv these larger size! Great deal, molds come out very easy.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well. The candies are about the size of jolly ranchers. I'm very happy with them

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids are so excited to make their own Gummy Bears!

customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the PDF file that is promised with purchase

customer_reviews.title: And the fact that I waited longer and wasn't delivered as promised I'm really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to be xl gummy bears not xl trays. And the fact that I waited longer and wasn't delivered as promised I'm really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I have ordered from them and both times were great. Bears are as advertised - easier to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and when communicating by email was VERY quick in responding to questions. This is the second time I have ordered from them and both times were great. Bears are as advertised - easier to eat since they are not so small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!! I love making gummies for my kiddos ...
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME!! I love making gummies for my kiddos with healthier ingredients like juice and high quality gelatin and these were the perfect molds! The bigger gummy bear size made making a batch so much easier and the kids loved them! I'll probably order more in other shapes now too. Thanks for the quick shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!!! My daughter is so thrilled to make gummy bears for not just our family, but all her school mates as well. Better and more creative than playing video games. I highly recommend this for all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give the product a better review but I waited and waited for the recipe ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give the product a better review but I waited and waited for the recipe pdf and it never arrived. When I decided to give up and return the item the return period expired the day before. Now I have a product I can’t use because I don’t have any recipes as promised. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!! I made elderberry gummies for my son
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! I made elderberry gummies for my son. Now it makes it a lot easier to give him elderberry! This size is just like the ones you buy in the store. So glad I read the reviews of the other molds....super tiny! These molds are the perfect size and the droppers are really helpful too! I highly recommend these! I did use a coconut oil spray, but I will try without next time. They came out super easy. A few here and there lost their arms or legs. I think it comes down to technique. Make sure to pull from the head down to the feet when pulling bears out.
customer_reviews.author: ihgal78

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mold Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: These molds are awesome and the gummy bears pop out easily. I used 1/3 cup water, 1 packet of Jolly Rancher gelatin and 2 packets of unflavored gelatin. Put cold water in pot with all the gelatin and let it sit for a few minutes. Stir and warm on medium heat until it turns to liquid about 3 minutes then pour into molds with dropper. This fills one tray. Nice gummy consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Saemi Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Love these gummy molds!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order very quickly. My granddaughter and I have now used the gummy bear molds twice since receiving them. The molds are the perfect size and very easy to use. I received recipes via email and the instructions were very easy to follow. We let the molds sit for 20 minutes but should have waited another 10 minutes. Once we waited the additional time, the gummies were extremely easy to pop out. Very easy clean up. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D Webb

customer_reviews.title: LIKE AN ACTUAL BITEFUL OF GUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I read a LOT of reviews on gummy bear molds. This is the one! The bears are cute, they pop right out, and they are SIZEABLE. LIKE AN ACTUAL BITEFUL OF GUMMY. Each dropperful is for one gummy (instead of like 3), thereby giving your squeezing hand less of a workout. 3 molds with 3 droppers for my 3 children! I am down with supporting small businesses and Avery Road is responsive and thoughtful in their customer care. Free recipes for gummies and excellent price pointing. WIN.
customer_reviews.author: Alinna Satake

customer_reviews.title: Great "bear" size, heavy molds
customer_reviews.text: Like Goldilocks, this was my third try at ordering molds. While the first two sets were OK, this was perfect for my needs. The gummies release easy and the molds are easy to clean if you don't allow the gunk to harden. I am ordering more for larger batches but this pack makes plenty for most users. I tried spraying the molds with veg oil to see if the release was even quicker but did not find that to be the case, It would be interesting to try a corn starch barrier but I cannot incorporate that ingredient into my formula.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Molds!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make ACV bites. They work pretty well but the level of detail (which is a good thing) can be a bit much if you are using Agar Agar powder instead of gelatin (although I ended up freezing them and they popped out great).
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size...especially for little helpers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make gummies with my 5 year and 3.5 year old grandkids. I had purchased other sets but the molds were too tiny. These were a perfect size to allow grandkids to fill. I followed the simplest recipe....jello pack with gelatin....provided by seller and they were perfect. They came out of the molds whole and easily without having to use anything to coat the inside. We will definitely be trying other recipes as the kids had fun making their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work great Nice molds worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Nice large size bears like you get in store. Come out of molds easy if you turn them inside out with your finger when set up. Clean up fast and easy in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy product to use!
customer_reviews.text: I just used mine yesterday and loved it! Each gummy bear well holds exactly 1 tsp, with 35 wells per mold, in case you're curious. I found a very simple recipe on line. (Recipes do not come with the molds, but it is easy to find all kinds of recipes: If you Google Gummy Bear recipes, a bunch will pop up to choose from.) The mold is very thin, but held up fine, and the gummies were easy to release. I really like having the droppers!!! It saves so much more time than trying to spoon the liquid into the molds. Fun product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love these molds! I have used them multiple times. They are super easy to pop out of the mold and I have had no trouble cleaning them with just a soak in hot water. My kids use them all the time too. They help fill them with the dropper and they love popping the out of the molds too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Best thing if you are monitoring your sugar!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST thing ever. For a person on a lifestyle diet (diabetic) and I was craving a sweet, but not a lot of sweet. This is perfect. I can make the little treats, and have my 'sweet' fix, and still maintain my levels. And so easy too! Easy to make, easy to firm up, easy to pop out, and way easy to clean. I love them, and I use them weekly!
customer_reviews.author: Erika S.

customer_reviews.title: The gummy bear molds arrived on time and I have had good results using them.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the molds are of the larger bears. They are so close to the Hasibo originals! I tried using the droppers which were included but did not have much success with them. It was much easier to fill the molds from a measuring cup. And the measuring cup was easy to clean compared to trying to clean the droppers. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: VeeO

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love Making Gummy Bears!
customer_reviews.text: The molds were amazingly easy to use and clean. We used a simple "fake Haribo" recipe with raspberry jello. Citric acid made the flavor better, and made half of them sour gummy bears. We didn't bother using the droppers, just mixed the recipe in a microwavable glass Pyrex with a pouring spout, went straight to the molds. 10/10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tmk

customer_reviews.title: Great molds
customer_reviews.text: We use these molds to make hardy candy. The mold withstands 300 degree hot liquid and the candy pops out beautifully when done. The clean easily in the dishwasher and have retained shape. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thecoolkid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome molds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make Elderberry gummie bears for immunity support. I ordered a mini version of this mold from a different vendor and wanted a larger size. The gummie bears came out great and was happy with the size. I used a non stick spray and the gummies came out of the mold easily. Clean up was easy. I Put the molds on the top rack of the dishwasher. Handwashing would have been tricker.
customer_reviews.author: Ma girl

customer_reviews.title: I bought these so my daughter can make healthy gummy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so my daughter can make healthy gummy bears using grass fed gelatin and juice. He loves them and asks for them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Molds and So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: I loved the molds but disappointed with the gummy bears. They're more like Jello bears and lack the consistency of store bought gummy bears but we had so much fun, it didn't matter. I also bought for my nephews and they loved getting the molds and their Mom did too. I would order again. I liked the size and the ease with which to remove the bears. Just spray lightly first and wipe down with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: LCardlin

customer_reviews.title: Work extremely well and are the perfect gummy size.
customer_reviews.text: These work extremely well. Have already made about 10 batches and I haven't had one issue yet, expect for with the recipes. Have washed them both by hand and also in the dishwasher and they hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these silicone molds!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these molds. You do not need any spray or oil to keep the gummy's from sticking. They came out perfectly. Each gummy holds 1 teaspoon of liquid. I made elderberry gummy's and they turned out excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Great molds, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great molds, easy to use. With all silicon mold when making candy, use a dusting of corn starch then tap excess off. All the people giving bad reviews don't know this step for making candy so that is why their bears are ripping apart and not coming out all the way.
customer_reviews.author: steven gustafson
